      • startNewGame

        public void startNewGame(GameMode mode)
        Description copied from interface: DameBackendInterface
        Start a new game. Should call GUI's method showBoard(Board board), showMessageBox(MessageBox msg) with some Welcometext and initiateTurn();
        Specified by:
        startNewGame in interface DameBackendInterface
        Parameters:
        mode - Enum GameType (10x10, 8x8, etc)

        private boolean getAllowedCoordinates(Stone stone,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> coordinates)
        Gets all allowed new coordinates for a given stone
        Parameters:
        stone - stone for which the allowed coordinates shall be returned
        coordinates - Arraylist of coordinates ByRef in which allowed coordinates are written
        Returns:

      • getVictory

        private java.util.Optional<java.lang.Boolean> getVictory()
        Checks if somebody has won and if so, who
        Returns:
        Optional Boolean (true: Player 1 has won, false: Player 2 / Computer has won, Optional.empty: nobody has won
